name: Protect Your Timeline!
description:
This game is playable in-browser. Read the intro and click Start to save the spacetime continuum.

Protect Your Timeline! is a short time-travel game. Collect all the crystals before time runs out. Use your magic sword to travel back in time, and protect your past selves as your timeline changes. This game was made in two weeks.

If you have any feedback/suggestions, please leave a comment!

Anthony Ilersich (me) - code, design, art
Caelius Tarantino - music
